We have made progress in these three months, but much remains to be done in the three main areas; the advances are few, but they are defined.
The #PactoHambreCero was created with the aim of reducing the chronic malnutrition rates that affect thousands of families in the country.
The #PactoHambreCero is being implemented in the municipalities of San Juan Atitán, Huehuetenango; Concepción Tutuapa and San Marcos.
We would like to have more results, we know what the path is; It's just a matter of time to keep walking, to get more results.
"Beyond the Horizon Guatemala" aims to conduct medical conferences, reconstruction of schools, health centers and roads.
Cabinet retreat today to coordinate annual program activities.

In two years time we intend to have all information about basic education, health and water available online. #OGP2012

>> The information will also be available on 
the mobile phone as well as on public notice boards, so that every citizen can stay informed.
To most of us, getting information on things that have impact on our daily lives is more relevant than complex national policy frameworks.
We believe that a Government that is open understands its people; is accountable to its people and governs with the people. #OGP2012

An alternation always starts from a distance, it is never a fantasy, a whim. #Cenon # FH2012
An alternation is a sum of anger against injustices, against so many failures to the values ​​of the Republic. #Cenon
An alternation is built around a will, that of a people who at one time stands up and asserts itself. #Cenon # FH2012
I feel your enthusiasm, it goes up, it goes up! #Cenon # FH2012
The incumbent said he saw a wave. For once he was not mistaken: she arrives the wave! #Cenon # FH2012
She is tall, powerful and the candidate-outgoing will take it face this wave! #Cenon # FH2012
The stake of Sunday is not a classification, the stake of Sunday is to place at the highest the candidate of the change! #Cenon # FH2012
The risk of outbidding the incumbent is the vote for the National Front! #Cenon # FH2012
There are no two left ones: on one side the left of the resistance and on the other the left of the conquest! #Cenon # FH2012
No, there is only one left: who wants to continue the great fight for justice and for equality! #Cenon # FH2012
In our country, it is democracy, it is the French people who choose their destiny! #Cenon # FH2012
Three more days and then, if we deserve it, two weeks of campaign! #Cenon # FH2012
It will be a hard, bitter, sometimes brutal fight where all the fears will be agitated. #Cenon # FH2012
Everything will depend on you! #Cenon # FH2012
This five-year period has been one of all excesses. #Cenon # FH2012
A normal presidency is to refuse to promise what I will not be able to hold! #Cenon # FH2012
I want to be a President who can take his choices and continue to meet the French. #Cenon # FH2012
We must allow the generation that has just lived better than ours! #Cenon # FH2012
You know everything, I did not hide anything! http://t.co/zuUShNgL #Cenon # FH2012
If I was able to lead this campaign, I owe it to this spirit of unity and gathering that has been ours in recent months! #Cenon # FH2012
Since 1981, there has never been a rally as strong as today! #PS #Cenon # FH2012
We will have to act for gender equality! #Cenon # FH2012
We will make the School at the beginning of the school year the first requirement, the first duty of the President! #Cenon # FH2012
I learned a lot in this campaign, and I do not want a country that doubts its future. #Cenon # FH2012
Make sure, on April 22 and May 6, to fight to convince you to come and vote for change! #Cenon # FH2012
We have 3 days left, each vote will count! #Cenon # FH2012
What makes the difference is not the money, what makes the difference is to be the most numerous! # 22avril #Cenon # FH2012
April 22 is not a day like any other, this election is not an election like the others! #Cenon # FH2012
It is time to give France a successor to François Mitterrand. #Cenon # FH2012
To straighten France, it will be necessary to gather it! #Cenon # FH2012
There are no two France fighting each other, there is a France that will have enough energy to master its destiny! #Cenon # FH2012
Whenever the left comes to the responsibilities, it advances the beautiful idea of ​​freedom! #Cenon # FH2012
We will ask Europe to fight against speculation, to fight against finance! #Cenon # FH2012

We have so much to do on Sunday! # 22avril #Cenon # FH2012

In a democracy, when a balance sheet is so heavy, it is legitimate to change the President! #Charleville # FH2012
We must give a successor to François Mitterrand! #Charleville # FH2012
We will never accept that a 16 year old is sentenced because he or she has failed! #Charleville # FH2012
We will change the tax on companies: the larger ones will pay more taxes, the smaller ones will pay less! #Charleville
The challenge is the employment of all! #Charleville # FH2012
Justice is first and foremost social justice! #Charleville # FH2012
This is essential in the transition and construction of Socialism: that poverty does not exist in Venezuela! Capitalism is a factory of poverty!
Now it's the turn of the left to lead the country! #Charleville # FH2012
I know what awaits us: straighten the country by creating momentum and all contests will be welcome! #Charleville # FH2012
I believe in local democracy! #Charleville # FH2012
I will strengthen the presence of unions in collective decisions. #Charleville # FH2012
We need all the strengths of France! #Charleville # FH2012
We are the youngest country in Europe, it's a strength! #Charleville # FH2012
We must resume the march of history! We are in a collective narrative, I want to remember 2012! #Charleville # FH2012
I ask you to give me the ability to win the presidential election! #Charleville # FH2012
Here the Arañero de Sabaneta, Elías! Live the Central Zamora! We are going to be an agricultural power!
We must be free, proud, worthy for tomorrow, preside over France! #Charleville # FH2012
A hug of a thousand arms to everyone there in my beloved Sabaneta, back in the savannas of Barinas! Let's continue building Socialism!
